title: Draft Pick doesn't work!
body:
Hi guys,

I need your help to solve a problem that my game has. For some reason, **my draft pick does not function anymore**. Whenever I want to play it, it's just display "please wait" and don't even get to the queueing interface. This is the first time I have this problem. I have tried to force a repatch and it did not work. If you have experienced this and solved this bizarre problem, please give me detailed instructions on how to fix this! 
 
I truly appreciate your time and help! Thank you!

replies.body: still having these issues along with many others

It seems that there was indeed a brief issue with Champ Select where games weren't starting properly.  This seemed to have been resolved fairly quickly, so let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

My ranked and draft pick still do not work... please fix/help!
{{item:3070}}
I am still having the same issue as OP. It's been a few hours now. Any draft pick mode will give you a blank screen then will kick you back to the main screen after about 30 seconds.
